arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona starting lineup against Newcastle United
arts.sum: FC Barcelona begin their UEFA Champions League campaign with a tough away fixture against Newcastle United at St. James’ Park tonight. With kickoff not far away, Barcelona manager Hansi Flick has announced the starting lineup that will be taking the field against Eddie Howe’s men. arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona starting XI against Newcastle United | UCL
arts.sum: The first UEFA Champions League game of the season is here for FC Barcelona. Taking on Newcastle United away from home, this will certainly be a troublesome game for the Catalan giants and will surely test them. However, despite the absence of Lamine Yamal and certain other key players from the official squad for this […] The post Official: Barcelona starting XI against Newcastle United | UCL appeared first on Sempre Barca.

arts.ttl: Newcastle star not phased about Barcelona clash – Tough Champions League games a reward
arts.sum: Newcastle United defender Fabian Schär has insisted they won’t back down to Barcelona, and the fixture is a reward for their performances last season. Blick have an interview with the Newcastle star today in which he insists they aren’t looking negatively on their tough upcoming Champions League campaign. arts.ttl: Newcastle United v Barcelona: Champions League – live
arts.sum: ⚽ Champions League updates from the 8pm BST kick-off ⚽ Latest scores | Follow us on Bluesky | And mail Barry Yet to make his debut for Newcastle after signing from Brentford towards the end of the transfer window, Yoane Wissa has been ruled out of tonight’s match with injury and is expected to be out for several more weeks. arts.ttl: Newcastle plot STUNNING €90m transfer raid on Barcelona
arts.sum: While Newcastle's squad is very well built to play fast and direct football with bundles athleticism and aggression across many positions but particularly in midfield where Eddie Howe has three snarling pitbulls ready to rock, it is short a genuine creative wizard. Having endured a frustrating summer 2025 when they lost out on several top targets, Newcastle want 2026 to be much more fruitful and to that end are looking to raid Barcelona for one of their elite talents.
